content: **this pattern is also available for free on my blog 1 ** these simple and comfortable socks with reinforced heel will be great companion on forest walks & mushroom picking trips perfect for beginners - they re worked cuff down with standard heel flap and gusset construction the pattern contains linked video tutorials so it s even easier to craft your first sock pair **sizes** 1 2 3 corresponding to sock circumferences 17 5 20 22 5 cm / approx 7 8 9 choose a size that is 1-2 5 cm 0 5 - 1 smaller than your foot circumference measured before the toes foot length is adjustable - for good fit knit a sock approx 1 cm 0 5 shorter than your actual foot length **yarn & yardage** 240 280 320 m - 260 305 350 yds of fingering weight category 1 - super fine yarn sample worked in woollala sock merino - 75% merino 25% nylon 425 m 465 yds per 100g if you plan to lengthen the leg of the sock or knit a foot longer than 25 cm 10 please take into account that it will increase yardage required **needles & notions** needles 2 5 mm us 1 5 circular needles 80 - 100 cm 32 - 40 or to fit gauge notions stitch marker tapestry needle 1 https //whileberry com/blog/woodland-socks-free-knitting-pattern
